body: Actually, I tried GRPC_TRACE=all and GRPC_TRACE=api today and it seemed it doesn't print anything at all.
To see the output, you also need to increase the logging verbosity: `GRPC_VERBOSITY=DEBUG`.
I think you need to set GRPC_VERBOSITY=DEBUG as well.

I'm doing the same, and I have to interpret the following data to see my request headers:

```
(venv) brianwatson@brianwatson0:~$ GRPC_TRACE=all GRPC_VERBOSITY=DEBUG python list_topics_gcloud.py 2>&1 | grep SEND_INITIAL_METADATA
I1013 15:34:53.263391576   41791 call.c:1366]                ops[0]: SEND_INITIAL_METADATA
I1013 15:34:53.263430528   41791 client_channel.c:109]       OP[client-channel:0x2e04c68]: SEND_INITIAL_METADATA{key=3a 70 61 74 68 ':path' value=2f 67 6f 6f 67 6c 65 2e 70 75 62 73 75 62 2e 76 31 2e 50 75 62 6c 69 73 68 65 72 2f 4c 69 73 74 54 6f 70 69 63 73 '/google.pubsub.v1.Publisher/ListTopics', key=3a 61 75 74 68 6f 72 69 74 79 ':authority' value=70 75 62 73 75 62 2e 67 6f 6f 67 6c 65 61 70 69 73 2e 63 6f 6d 3a 34 34 33 'pubsub.googleapis.com:443', key=78 2d 67 6f 6f 67 2d 61 70 69 2d 63 6c 69 65 6e 74 'x-goog-api-client' value=67 61 78 2f 30 2e 31 34 2e 31 20 67 61 70 69 63 2f 30 2e 31 2e 30 20 67 61 78 2f 30 2e 31 34 2e 31 20 70 79 74 68 6f 6e 2f 32 2e 37 2e 31 32 'gax/0.14.1 gapic/0.1.0 gax/0.14.1 python/2.7.12', key=67 72 70 63 2d 65 6e 63 6f 64 69 6e 67 'grpc-encoding' value=69 64 65 6e 74 69 74 79 'identity', key=67 72 70 63 2d 61 63 63 65 70 74 2d 65 6e 63 6f 64 69 6e 67 'grpc-accept-encoding' value=69 64 65 6e 74 69 74 79 2c 64 65 66 6c 61 74 65 2c 67 7a 69 70 'identity,deflate,gzip' deadline=2100952.082943308} SEND_MESSAGE:flags=0x00000000:len=21 SEND_TRAILING_METADATA{} RECV_INITIAL_METADATA RECV_MESSAGE RECV_TRAILING_METADATA
I1013 15:34:53.548149929   41791 http_client_filter.c:171]   OP[http-client:0x2e0cb00]: SEND_INITIAL_METADATA{key=3a 70 61 74 68 ':path' value=2f 67 6f 6f 67 6c 65 2e 70 75 62 73 75 62 2e 76 31 2e 50 75 62 6c 69 73 68 65 72 2f 4c 69 73 74 54 6f 70 69 63 73 '/google.pubsub.v1.Publisher/ListTopics', key=3a 61 75 74 68 6f 72 69 74 79 ':authority' value=70 75 62 73 75 62 2e 67 6f 6f 67 6c 65 61 70 69 73 2e 63 6f 6d 3a 34 34 33 'pubsub.googleapis.com:443', key=78 2d 67 6f 6f 67 2d 61 70 69 2d 63 6c 69 65 6e 74 'x-goog-api-client' value=67 61 78 2f 30 2e 31 34 2e 31 20 67 61 70 69 63 2f 30 2e 31 2e 30 20 67 61 78 2f 30 2e 31 34 2e 31 20 70 79 74 68 6f 6e 2f 32 2e 37 2e 31 32 'gax/0.14.1 gapic/0.1.0 gax/0.14.1 python/2.7.12', key=67 72 70 63 2d 65 6e 63 6f 64 69 6e 67 'grpc-encoding' value=69 64 65 6e 74 69 74 79 'identity', key=67 72 70 63 2d 61 63 63 65 70 74 2d 65 6e 63 6f 64 69 6e 67 'grpc-accept-encoding' value=69 64 65 6e 74 69 74 79 2c 64 65 66 6c 61 74 65 2c 67 7a 69 70 'identity,deflate,gzip', key=61 75 74 68 6f 72 69 7a 61 74 69 6f 6e 'authorization' value=42 65 61 72 65 72 20 79 61 32 39 2e 43 6a 46 37 41 79 4a 7a 6d 55 6d 30 6b 32 4b 52 49 4a 61 37 76 35 33 61 6d 58 5f 66 38 6e 6f 4b 6d 63 36 4b 56 4d 68 75 53 54 38 67 49 4d 51 37 64 42 62 36 51 6b 54 66 41 4f 61 61 54 76 68 78 6f 43 31 52 'Bearer ya29.CjF7AyJzmUm0k2KRIJa7v53amX_f8noKmc6KVMhuST8gIMQ7dBb6QkTfAOaaTvhxoC1R' deadline=2100952.082943308} SEND_MESSAGE:flags=0x00000000:len=21 SEND_TRAILING_METADATA{} RECV_INITIAL_METADATA RECV_MESSAGE RECV_TRAILING_METADATA
I1013 15:34:53.548217709   41791 connected_channel.c:70]     OP[connected:0x2e0cb18]: SEND_INITIAL_METADATA{key=3a 73 63 68 65 6d 65 ':scheme' value=68 74 74 70 73 'https', key=3a 6d 65 74 68 6f 64 ':method' value=50 4f 53 54 'POST', key=3a 70 61 74 68 ':path' value=2f 67 6f 6f 67 6c 65 2e 70 75 62 73 75 62 2e 76 31 2e 50 75 62 6c 69 73 68 65 72 2f 4c 69 73 74 54 6f 70 69 63 73 '/google.pubsub.v1.Publisher/ListTopics', key=3a 61 75 74 68 6f 72 69 74 79 ':authority' value=70 75 62 73 75 62 2e 67 6f 6f 67 6c 65 61 70 69 73 2e 63 6f 6d 3a 34 34 33 'pubsub.googleapis.com:443', key=78 2d 67 6f 6f 67 2d 61 70 69 2d 63 6c 69 65 6e 74 'x-goog-api-client' value=67 61 78 2f 30 2e 31 34 2e 31 20 67 61 70 69 63 2f 30 2e 31 2e 30 20 67 61 78 2f 30 2e 31 34 2e 31 20 70 79 74 68 6f 6e 2f 32 2e 37 2e 31 32 'gax/0.14.1 gapic/0.1.0 gax/0.14.1 python/2.7.12', key=67 72 70 63 2d 65 6e 63 6f 64 69 6e 67 'grpc-encoding' value=69 64 65 6e 74 69 74 79 'identity', key=67 72 70 63 2d 61 63 63 65 70 74 2d 65 6e 63 6f 64 69 6e 67 'grpc-accept-encoding' value=69 64 65 6e 74 69 74 79 2c 64 65 66 6c 61 74 65 2c 67 7a 69 70 'identity,deflate,gzip', key=61 75 74 68 6f 72 69 7a 61 74 69 6f 6e 'authorization' value=42 65 61 72 65 72 20 79 61 32 39 2e 43 6a 46 37 41 79 4a 7a 6d 55 6d 30 6b 32 4b 52 49 4a 61 37 76 35 33 61 6d 58 5f 66 38 6e 6f 4b 6d 63 36 4b 56 4d 68 75 53 54 38 67 49 4d 51 37 64 42 62 36 51 6b 54 66 41 4f 61 61 54 76 68 78 6f 43 31 52 'Bearer ya29.CjF7AyJzmUm0k2KRIJa7v53amX_f8noKmc6KVMhuST8gIMQ7dBb6QkTfAOaaTvhxoC1R', key=74 65 'te' value=74 72 61 69 6c 65 72 73 'trailers', key=63 6f 6e 74 65 6e 74 2d 74 79 70 65 'content-type' value=61 70 70 6c 69 63 61 74 69 6f 6e 2f 67 72 70 63 'application/grpc', key=75 73 65 72 2d 61 67 65 6e 74 'user-agent' value=50 79 74 68 6f 6e 2d 67 52 50 43 2d 31 2e 30 2e 30 20 67 72 70 63 2d 63 2f 31 2e 30 2e 30 20 28 6d 61 6e 79 6c 69 6e 75 78 3b 20 63 68 74 74 70 32 29 'Python-gRPC-1.0.0 grpc-c/1.0.0 (manylinux; chttp2)' deadline=2100952.082943308} SEND_MESSAGE:flags=0x00000000:len=21 SEND_TRAILING_METADATA{} RECV_INITIAL_METADATA RECV_MESSAGE RECV_TRAILING_METADATA
```

Searching for a present header key (like `user-agent`) does not show anything nicer to read.
